name: Recipeace
description: Recipeace is a SPA that lets you search for specific food items and have a recipe populate. If you're feeling adventurous, hit the 'Surprise Me' button or randomize!

name: JobSearchTracker
description: Job Search Tracker, (name in progress...) is a site that will allow you to keep track of the interviewing process. It helps to keep you organized and aware of the who, what and where during your job hunt.

name: FlashCards
description: Flash Cards is a browser based game that will test your knowledge with a point based system. Play along and see if you can get them all correct!
